vote.title: Authorize an acquisition contract for the purchase of equipment, parts, and labor to install public safety equipment on the new Airbus H125 helicopter for the Dallas Police Department with Helicopter Services, Inc. through procurement by the General Services Administration Cooperative Purchasing Program - Not to exceed $3,371,193.00 - Financing: 2025 Master Lease-Equipment Fund ($3,058,901.00) and Confiscated Monies-Federal-Dept. of Treasury Fund ($312,292.00)
vote.description: Authorize an acquisition contract for the purchase of equipment, parts, and labor to install public safety equipment on the new Airbus H125 helicopter for the Dallas Police Department with Helicopter Services, Inc. through procurement by the General Services Administration Cooperative Purchasing Program - Not to exceed $3,371,193.00 - Financing: 2025 Master Lease-Equipment Fund ($3,058,901.00) and Confiscated Monies-Federal-Dept. of Treasury Fund ($312,292.00)
